about_the_game:
More Panda is a 5-Reel, 20-Payline aussie Style poker machine with editor.
Free Spins is awarded for 3 Scattered on any line and on all reels.
Wild Substitutes during normal play for all symbols except Red Lantern , Chinese fan, Free Spins and Scatters and Bonus reels.
During Free Spins 2X multiplier pay double - X5 pays 5 times the amount and 2X + 5X on same line multiplies win x10.
2x and 5x substitute for all symbols except scattered, bonus and free spins.

World's first dual screen slot for the home market.
Now with autodetecting dual screen depicting game logo on second screen and big win animations.

More Panda Slot Creator, Bigger, Better, Brighter, and easier to create and play. Ever wanted to create a slot game but did know how to program.
Here is the next best thing, More Panda Slot Creator is a great app and game to create a slot game for the gaming community now includes save game option.

More Panda Slot Creator the ultimate game creator for slot machine enthusiasts who want to create and play their own slot machine games. More Panda Slot Creator has something for everyone, whether you are a beginner, or an expert, a casual player or a hardcore fan More Panda Slot Creator has it all.

Do you want to create and play your own slot machine games? If so, then you will love More Panda Slot Creator, the ultimate custom slot machine games platform that lets you unleash your creativity and imagination.

More Panda Slot Creator has a library of many games that you can choose from, or you can start from scratch and design your own game. You can customize many aspect of your game, such as the theme, graphics, sounds, symbols. You can also test and tweak your game until you are satisfied with the result. Once you are done, you can share your game with other players and play their games as well, better still you can sell your saved games on Slot Factory marketplace.

More Panda Slot Creator is a fun and innovative way to enjoy slot machine games. You can express your personality and style through your own game, or you can explore the games created by other players and discover new and exciting themes and features. More Panda Slot Creator is also a great way to learn about game design and development, as well as to improve your skills and knowledge. More Panda Slot Creator is more than just a platform, it is a community of slot machine lovers who share their passion and creativity.

Additional notes: Save games cannot be overwritten if game is loaded. Save games are made with extension *.mpscv1
When saving even in stages always save as a new file otherwise the software will detect if you do and exit the game to prevent file been overwritten.
There will be many new games in this series, using the same engine, different themes and gameplay, save games will only work on this series.
Games available in this series:

More Panda - Slot Creator
More Spooky - Slot Creator
More Valentines - Slot Creator
More Farmland Fun - Slot Creator
More Gansters - Slot Creator
More Christmas - Slot Creator
More Greek Gyros - Slot Creator
More Fruity Fun - Slot Creator

Percentage payout similar to actual real play slots and wins are based on 1 cent gameplay.
All our games are for amusement only.

content_descriptors.notes: Simulated Gambling with Sound and Graphics Editor

name: More Panda - Slot Creator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Standard Video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard Sound Card - Internal or External
  • Additional Notes: Extra hardrive space required for save games.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Standard Video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard Sound Card - Internal or External
  • Additional Notes: Extra hardrive space required for save games.
